text.alert_message: This extension allows you to obtain business registration information based on company name, registration number, or universal social credit code among other keywords, supporting Alibaba Cloud Market interface

labels.help_appcode: Please paste the AppCode as per the extension usage documentation

placeholder.field: Please select the field where the company name is located
placeholder.apiurl: No change needed under normal circumstances

error.fetch_error: Request failed, please check if it's a network issue
error.has_error: An error was encountered, skip is currently in progress

success.finished: Operation is complete, please check the base
